schemas.description: The fourth data release of the SkyMapper Southern Survey; 6-band optical survey conducted with the Australian National Universitys 1.3m SkyMapper Telescope at Siding Spring Observatory in Australia

tables.description: Primary table of mean astrometric, photometric, and shape measurements per object, with cross-match information to external tables.
Table of individual photometric, astrometric, and shape measurements for every detection. Can be joined to the master table using the object_id column.
